name: Authority to participate in multistate negotiations
text: §255D-3  Authority to participate in multistate negotiations.  For the purposes of reviewing or amending the agreement embodying the simplification requirements in section 255D-6, the State may enter into multistate discussions.  For purposes of these discussions, the State shall be represented by the department. [L 2003, c 173, pt of §2; am L Sp 2005, c 3, §3]
